questions.a: Vairify is the most advanced safety platform for adult service providers. We provide real identity verification, safety monitoring, and community reputation systems ‚Äî all for free.

ChainPass V.A.I. stands for Verified Anonymous Identity. It's a 7-character code that proves you've completed government ID verification without exposing your real identity. One person, one ChainPass V.A.I. for life.
About 5 minutes. You'll verify your identity once through ChainPass V.A.I., and then you can use your V.A.I. to verify yourself in seconds forever.
Yes. All safety features are free forever. Premium features ($29.99/month) add convenience, not safety. You never have to pay to be protected.

When you meet someone, they show you their ChainPass V.A.I. QR code. You scan it, both of you take a live selfie, and the system confirms you're both who your ChainPass V.A.I.s say you are. Takes seconds.

questions.q: What if someone fakes their ChainPass V.A.I.?
questions.a: They can't. ChainPass V.A.I. verification requires a live facial match. The face in front of you must match the face on the ChainPass V.A.I. ‚Äî and we check for liveness to prevent photos or videos.
DateGuard is our real-time safety monitoring system. You set a timer, and if you don't check in, your designated guardians are automatically notified with your location.
VaiPulse provides real-time intelligence about your area ‚Äî active alerts, community warnings, and safety information based on your location.

Only the government-certified KYC provider (ComplyCube) who verifies your ID. ChainPass V.A.I. receives only your verified photo. Vairify receives only your ChainPass V.A.I. number and photo. No one has your full identity.
Vairify stores your ChainPass V.A.I. number, verified photo, and platform activity. We never store your name, address, date of birth, or government ID numbers.
Yes. You can delete your Vairify account at any time. However, your ChainPass V.A.I. number and verified photo are retained to prevent duplicate registrations (fraud prevention).
Founding Council members vote on platform policies, feature priorities, and community governance. Expect to vote every 5 days during the launch phase.
We present decisions with clear options. You vote. Majority wins. Results are implemented within days, not months.
Everything from feature release order to community policies to premium pricing to safety protocols. You're building this with us.
